google_play_reviews.content: Certainly the best android client for NS! It's well-designed and handles everything smoothly. Overall a very good experience. The national and regional pages are handled well and give helpful data. Resolving issues (an in-game feature, not bugs with the app) works as expected, and the layout is nice and somewhat customizable.  I was a bit disappointed by the lack of ability to use nation settings in the app. I also found that regional message boards, while tidy, were not prominently featured, and lacked national flags. There is also no forum client or access to the "Challenge" page or dispatches. Overall, nothing too problematic, just features that would make this app more compete.  If the creator adds a forum client (which I'm sure is difficult, but it's something I'd love to see) and dispatches, I would consider this app worth five stars and even, perhaps, worth a (99¢) purchase.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for the detailed feedback! Nation settings and factbooks may be included in a future version. The lack of flags is sadly a limitation of the NationStates API. A forum client and challenges support is highly unlikely, sorry.
